subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Didier Drogba is teaming up with Wesley Sneijder at Galatasaray, giving that Turkish club a second major signing in a week and boosting its chances of making a run in the Champions League.
snippet: Didier Drogba is teaming up with Wesley Sneijder at Galatasaray, giving that Turkish club a second major signing in a week and boosting its chances of making a run in the Champions League.
